title: The Rise of AI in Everyday Life
content: Artificial intelligence is no longer a futuristic concept; itâ€™s a present-day reality. From personalized shopping recommendations to smart home devices, AI has seamlessly integrated into our daily routines. Experts predict that by 2030, over 80% of households worldwide will rely on at least one AI-powered device. As technology evolves, ethical debates surrounding privacy and data security also continue to shape conversations around responsible AI development.
